trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_SEQ_00<tab>Rhalgr's Reach is no longer safe, as Pipin well knows.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Orella.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_TODO_01<tab>Search the infirmary for medical supplies.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_TODO_02<tab>Give the medical supplies to the Flame courier.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_CONRAD_000_010<tab>I'll recover. My injuries aren't serious─though that was clearly by choice and not happenstance. They meant to take me alive.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_KRILE_000_015<tab>You're worried about Y'shtola, aren't you? <sigh> It's too early to make any kind of prognosis, but...she's alive. For now.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_LYSE_000_020<tab>If it wasn't for her, it'd be me lying there... <var 1A 02 /var>...I wish it was.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_YSHTOLA_000_025<tab>...
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_PIPIN_000_030<tab>Our defeat was no near thing. It was total─a humiliation. We were powerless to withstand our enemy's assault.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_PIPIN_000_031<tab>But we cannot afford to dwell on our failure. As Alphinaud said, it is those who survived whom we must think of now.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_PIPIN_000_032<tab>Rhalgr's Reach is no longer safe. The imperials may have withdrawn, but they could return at any time to finish what they began. We dare not remain here.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_PIPIN_000_033<tab>Those who are not fit to make the journey to Castrum Oriens will need to be taken by chocobo carriage. Agreed?

TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_PIPIN_000_034<tab>Good. I shall oversee preparations for the carriages. In the meantime, I would have you scour the infirmary for any supplies that might prove useful during the journey.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_ORELLA_100_040<tab>Forgive me, but it is imperative that I continue preparing medicines for the wounded. If you desire treatment, I must ask that you seek it elsewhere.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_ORELLA_100_041<tab>Oh, I see... In that case, you are free to search the Barber and take that which you require. I would not have our people dying en route.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_ORELLA_100_042<tab>I would assist you, but this process demands my undivided attention.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_ORELLA_200_042<tab>Take whatever you require for your needs. I will replenish the stock after.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_ALISAIE_000_045<tab>We're to move the wounded to Castrum Oriens? Understood. I'll go and see if anyone requires assistance.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_ALPHINAUD_000_050<tab>I will accompany Commander Kemp in one of the carriages.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_CONRAD_000_055<tab>No, no, I'd hate to be a burden...
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_KRILE_000_060<tab>We'll need to carry Y'shtola to the carriage. Could you give me a hand, Lyse?
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_LYSE_000_065<tab>As if you need to ask!

TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_FLAMECOURIER_000_070<tab><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 08 E3E93780 ((<var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>)) ((<var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Sir)) /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Sir)) /var>)) /var>. Marshal Tarupin said you might have something for me?
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_FLAMECOURIER_000_071<tab>Twelve be praised. This should put the drivers' hearts at ease. Tell the vice marshal we await his orders.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_KRILE_000_082<tab>Y'shtola and the others are safely strapped in. Don't worry─I'll be by her side the entire time.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_ALPHINAUD_000_083<tab>Thank you, Krile.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_LYSE_000_084<tab>I'll walk alongside. They'll need protection in case the Garleans try anything.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_LYSE_000_085<tab>Hang on. You're injured too, aren't you? Shouldn't you be in one of the carriages?
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_CONRAD_000_086<tab>I'm not so frail that I can't make the trip on my own. Besides, there's still work to be done here. I'll see you at the Wall when it's finished.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_PIPIN_000_087<tab>As you wish. Then let us set forth at once. We shall move as quickly as our comrades' health allows.
TEXT_STMBDA135_02465_PIPIN_000_088<tab>To Castrum Oriens!
